      • writeMessage

        public void writeMessage(java.lang.String message,
                boolean messageVisibleToEveryone)
        Description copied from class: ClientMenu
        Function that writes a message on the inputStream, and set its visibility according to the boolean flag if true = it will write on the matchlog.txt file, visibile by everyone. It won't do that if false.
